heroSubtitle: An epic journey into the heart of darkness
betaDesc: We are preparing something special. Leave your email to receive early access and exclusive news.
Testo1: Here, you don’t just enter a world… you shape it.
Testo2: Craft your own adventure from the very beginning: choose how your hero is born, what path they follow, and what they’ll face along the way.
Testo3: Explore forgotten ruins, battle legendary creatures, and alter every element of the world around you.
Testo7: Alone or with your companions, every story is different. Every choice matters.
Testo8: This isn’t a game that leads you.
Testo4: Unique procedurally generated dungeons with mysterious events and hidden paths.
Testo5: Turn-based system that influences every fight, decision, and character development.
Testo6: Every hero is different: you can create one with unique abilities or discover random ones.
newsletterDesc: Sign up to get beta keys, updates and news.

free.label: Free
free.description: Start your journey for free, no commitment.

premium.label: Premium
premium.description: Unleash your hero's full potential with Premium.

trailerNote: Turn on the sound and step into the legend.
